reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of THTR 130, THTR 230.
Students who have successfully taken THTR 230 or THTR 130 may register for this course.
This class will focus on the works in English translation of the ground-breaking Quebecois playwright Michel Tremblay. The class will consist of the study of monologues and scenes from several of his plays and will also include some study of the evolution of the playwright.
